title: My Pixel 2 becomes unresponsive and requires a hard reboot
content:
If my phone sleeps for about a minute, I am not able to wake it up. It will become frozen on the always on screen. I have to hold down the power button and do a hard reboot. I can avoid the phone from becoming unresponsive if I play audio or video in the background. So I have been playing music on mute to stop the phone from freezing. This is not ideal as it causes the battery to die faster.
I have tried booting into safe mode and the problem still occurs in safe mode. I have removed apps. I have disabled the always on display. I have performed a factory reset. Other than this issue, the phone performs as usual.
